Blog.post: Well I am all finished moving and everything is almost normal in my office I have to wait until next week for the phone company to do their thing, and later this week for internet but I have my cell phone and that will do for now. I am sooooooo excited because I booked a summer vacation for my hubby and I today. We are going on a 4 night cruise in August and I cant wait. We will need it by then because our summer schedule is packed and at least 4 weeks of it are going to be spent apart from each other. So that will be good to do at the end of it all and then I will be ready to kick off the new school year all rested and refreshed. Royal Caribbean International Monarch Of The Seas 4 Night Mexico Cruise Departing on August 30, 2004

I don't know sometime I just don't feel like doing anything... I love my job, but I'm just lazy today. Maybe I will feel better later. I have been trying to find out some family tree information and have found somebody in the Netherlands that has some matching information so that's cool. I have begun the painting process in my new office but its a lot of work. Anybody wanna help?

Well today I really started packing to move my office and it cool because there seems to be a lot of people that want to help me move. First I have to paint it and set up the furniture so I have a ton of work to do. I just found out the coolest thing today too... Supertones and Superchic[k] are going to be going on tour together and calling it the supertour. I am so going!!!!!!!!
wow i am just having too much fun with this... here i am with my cat
this should be fun, anybody have anything to say? i dunno.

Well it has been a while hasn't it? Been sooooooooooooo busy. June was consumed with camp and other activities. We had such a great time at camp. Tons o fun!! Anyway the next thing is Mexico, that is why I am busy now. We leave on July 30 for that. Getting all the bugs and details worked out for now then going is the easy fun part. and still excited about that cruise.
